snippet.title: SNES Longplay [037] Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose is a plataform game for the Super NES console that is based on the great animated TV series Tiny Toon Adventures. It was published, developed and released by Konami in 1992 in Japan and 1993 in Europe and North America.

A very fun game plataform game, fun like this excellent cartoon series, with references to famous movies. Played in Challenge mode to show a different and more animated ending from the original longplay (done by Parazzing) and with improvements in encode core. Acme Looniversity, here we go! Wink

Acme Looniversity: 02:12
The Western Movie: 10:19
Spook Mansion: 21:48
Acme Looniversity Football: 29:53
Buster Sky-jinks: 35:15
Space Opera: 42:01 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
